scripts.preserve-css: node -e "try { require('fs').copyFileSync('./public/style.css', './public/style.backup.css'); console.log('CSS backup created'); } catch(e) { console.log('Could not backup CSS, continuing...'); }"
scripts.build: npm run preserve-css && npm run build:css && npm run validate-css
scripts.vercel-build: npm run preserve-css && npm run build:css && (npm run validate-css || echo 'CSS validation skipped in Vercel environment')
